div.ab: On February 24, the Führer spoke at the party founding ceremony in the historic ballroom of the Munich High Brewery in the same place where he announced the NSDAP's program 21 years ago
2,000 of the oldest party comrades, who had come to Munich from all parts of the Reich and from all sections of the front, witnessed the Führer's great speech.
The Gauleiter of the Tradition Kraus Munich Upper Bavaria Adolf Wagner, welcomes the guide

In his speech, which was once again circulated around the world by the Round Dot, the Führer once again looked back at the tremendous triumph of the movement in the past 21 years and then, amid the enthusiastic cheers of the old guard, issued the slogan for the upcoming decisive battle with fanatical confidence Fuhrer's Castle. I see his speech in the future, the whole nation has now competed, and I know that at the moment when the command resounds, Ride fits, Germany will march.
Newly appointed Japanese ambassador Hiroshi Oshima presented the leader up the mountain with his credentials
The Führer arrives in Vienna on March 1st, Bulgaria's accession to the Tripartite Pact is completed.
The leader on the balcony of his hotel against him serving Gauleiter Reichsleiter Baldur von Schirach,
Bulgarian Prime Minister Professor Doctor Kilo arrives at Vienna's airfield
in front of Bellevue Palace, where representatives of the nations participating in the Tripartite Pact meet, a
Standing next to the Reich Foreign Minister of Ribbentrop, the Bulgarian Prime Minister, Professor of Many Laws, the Italian Foreign Minister Gaetano,

the Reich Foreign Minister, stated in his speech, among other things, that the work of all peoples united in the Tripartite Pact is already serving the final victory of the allies today. According to the Reich Foreign Minister, we represent the strongest constellation of power that has probably ever existed on earth. The armies are ready to leap to attack and defeat England wherever it appears, the political foundation on which freedom is fought, and its symbol will be the Tripartite Pact for all time. Signing of the pact by the representatives of the individual nations The Prime Minister of Bulgaria, Professor Doctor Kilo

After the signing ceremony, the Bulgarian Prime Minister made a statement. Bulganin Hoppe, as a loyal partner of the Tripartite Pact, he explains, is doing his part to bring about permanent peace and a just reorganization in Europe.
The guide's drive to Bellevue Palace, the one where he gave a reception after the completion of the state act.
The leader greets the representatives of the participating nations
The accession of Bulgaria to the Tripartite Pact is described throughout the world press as a new serious defeat of England and a new and great success for the peace policy of the Axis powers.

The fifth international winter sports week in Garmisch Partenkirchen took a brilliant course despite the war 13 nations were involved in the various competitions, of the 13 main decisions Germany was able to win. preflow
The winner was Rudi Kranz, Rudi can and his sister Christel, who won the women's goal run. abruzzo
The special jump run was won by German champion Josef Bradl with a width of 84 meters.
